product_name: Mountain House New Orleans Style Rice with Shrimp and Ham
long_description: Enjoy the Mountain House New Orleans Style Rice with Shrimp and Ham meal after a long day on the trail. Mix ingredients in the pouch provided with boiling water, let stand for a few minutes and then serve. Quick and filling dinner for camping and backpacking. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy the Mountain House New Orleans Style Rice with Shrimp and Ham meal after a long day on the trail.
